column2: first_episode <- snl_airtime_processed[1, ]  # Get the first episode
# Convert `run time (total)` from hms to seconds
# Combine the segments into one dataframe
geom_rect(aes(xmin = 0, xmax = episode_length, ymin = 0, ymax = 1), fill = "grey80") +
# Highlight Trump's airtime (top half of the bar)
aes(xmin = start, xmax = end, ymin = 0.5, ymax = 1), fill = "red") +
# Highlight Harris's airtime (bottom half of the bar)
aes(xmin = start, xmax = end, ymin = 0, ymax = 0.5), fill = "blue") +
# Add tick marks for every minute and every 15 seconds
breaks = seq(0, episode_length, by = 15),  # Tick marks every 15 seconds
labels = function(x) sprintf("%d:%02d", x %/% 60, x %% 60)  # Format as mm:ss
title = paste("SNL Airtime Visualization for Episode:", episode_title),
